website_summaries.verdict: These one-size-fits-all gloves are useful for handling food around an oven or outdoor grill.
pros: Very well insulated and effectively protect users from burning themselves
Gloves are quite flexible and feature grippy silicon dots
You'll be protected up to 650º F. Lining is made of breathable material
cons: Some users complain the fit is a little big

customer_reviews.title: A huge upgrade from oven mitts
customer_reviews.text: I find that these don't insulate QUITE as well as my old oven mitts, but other than that they are better in every way. Far more grippy surface, far more flexibility, far more comfortable, far more usable. Using oven mitts you are far more likely to drop your food than wearing these. They are well insulated and very comfortable. I'm not sure how well they will wash out food stains and only time will tell but so far I am incredibly happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Strategos

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace some old original Ove Gloves. These get uncomfortably hot much faster, so I have to move faster to set hot items down quickly. Definitely need a plan in advance - you can't just grab a hot baking pan and move around leisurely. The middle finger is a bit short. The multi layer fabric bunches a little as you slide your fingers in, so it takes a little wiggling to get comfortable. Overall, these gloves are inadequate for general, comfortable use with oven-hot pots and pans, so I'll be looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, dexterous protection!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic gloves. The fit well, dont compromise dexterity too much, and are incredibly heat proof. There are plenty of other reviews to this effect, so just adding my vote here. They are so durable I dont know if I'll ever need to, but I would definitely but another pair if one got lost, damaged or worn out over the years. I use these in the kitchen and outside for grilling, and they are endlessly useful! Amazing grip, comfort (I often forget to take them off :) ) and—so long as they stay dry, DO NOT USE IF THEY ARE WET!!—incredibly heat proof.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian E. Chaoulideer

customer_reviews.title: Good after some tailoring.
customer_reviews.text: my hands fit most gloves, no matter the occasion. these gloves have extra length in the thumbs which make it extremely difficult to hold hot/moist items. After contacting the seller/manufacturer and got no results, i took to a tailor w/ some heat resistant thread, they cut 3/4" off and restitched it, not it fits like a glove. (pun intended) as far as how it is supposed to work, ive used them a dozen times... and some of the plastic beads have come off. I am just glad i got these on super 50% off sale, I would have been furious if i had paid retail.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: High mobility and heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. Great grip, high heat resistance, I can grab pans from the oven and put my hand just above the flame on a propane grill. Not restrictive. I normally wear a large, I bought a large here and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Finite

customer_reviews.title: Wore out quickly
customer_reviews.text: These were great for a gift but they did not wear very well. They got these little balls all over them with just average use. Not the best problem to have when dealing with food. However, the maneuverability is great and they are heat resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Better fit, better grip
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a fan of the "long" leather BBQ gloves, but these have won me over! Better fit, better grip, better protection! There's been only one time I had a problem: I accidentally stuck my thumb into some hot grease, which instantly soaked through the glove and onto my skin - I couldn't get the glove off fast enough! Despite that, they are still my favorite BBQ glove, just be careful of hot liquids and grease!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Resistant Gloves that fit Big Hands
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered these gloves long ago! I have been looking for a solution to feeling the scorching heat of my grill when flipping lots of veggies. Long tongs help a little, but my hands would still end up over hot spots for too long. Reviews of other heat resistant gloves talk about their small fit. I have regular gloves from XL to XXXL. I took a chance on these in XL and they fit my big hands very well. Finally my hands are safe! These are my new favorite grill gloves and I can't want to use them for the oven as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage! Got burned taking a pizza out of the oven. To say nothing about handling grill grates. Heat transfers immediately. Offers no protection whatsoever. Danger of second degree burns!
customer_reviews.author: Winchy

customer_reviews.title: they work great!! The quality of construction is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves in May with a specific purpose in mind, I wanted to wear them under nitrile gloves to shred smoked pulled pork. Unfortunately that didn't work, the nitrile gloves were too small to fit over these gloves. If you want to use these as intended, to pull hot stuff out of your oven, they work great!! The quality of construction is outstanding, the kevlar/nomex material does an excellent job of protecting your hands from the heat, and the silicon dots do an excellent job of giving you the grip/control you need when handling hot dishes straight from the oven. These are waaaay better than "hot pads"
customer_reviews.author: T. Alley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.  Just buy it if you want a good set!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this set, but love it. I like in cold Minnesota and I'm not a mitten guy, so why use mittens for handling baking sheets, pans, etc? I like the ability to grip with all five fingers separately. I have medium/regular size hands and the fit of these gloves is kind of tight. If you have large hands you might find this type of heat-resistant glove uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tlarson6

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They make handling hot pans much less ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They make handling hot pans much less awkward and I use them all the time. Be sure to heed to warning not to get them wet. They can handle a lot of heat, but will start to feel hot after prolonged exposure to a hot cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Stout

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. I wear a medium size glove and I ordered a large. They fit fine with just a little extra at the ends of the fingers. They're comfortable and have no problem insulating from 450 degree heat. I've tried silicon mitts but they were too clumsy for me. The gloves are great for handling pots, trays and grills. These should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: and I love how they fit
customer_reviews.text: I confess that I own 2 sets of these fabulous oven gloves. Of course I have regular pot holders, as well, that were purchased through the years. What do I reach for 90% of the time? These fabulous oven gloves, of course, and I love how they fit. So easy to grasp hot bowls from microwave without the clumsy square pot holder or a mitt that is too bulky to hold on to. I ordered this oven glove for a family member going off to college along with cookware. Just throw in the washing machine when needed and you are ready to go again.
customer_reviews.author: BJJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, easy to put on, grab and hold whatever you want and the finger dexterity just makes for safer high temperature work. And I bought a pair for my wife and she just says they are the best and she has long manicured nails that "work" with these gloves. Highly recommended! I had the oven on over a half-hour at 450F and forgot to take the pizza stone out... put the gloves on and was an easy task.... and (using them) get's easier once you know you can trust these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality oven gloves
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these for me after I burned myself one too many times using only potholders for heat protection. We both have fairly large hands, so he went with size large. These work, but a medium would have been a better fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: EC music educator

customer_reviews.title: Plastic nubs melted on first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gloves to replace a well-loved but falling apart oven mitt. Definitely felt the heat when taking a pan out of a 400 degree oven and the nubs looked a bit melted. Shame on me for trying to find a better solution, I’m on the hunt for a regular oven mitt and these will go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuff way to long for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove but the cuff is at least twice the length as shown, didn't work for me so it was returned
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S Parteka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gloves, a must need if you are grilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my Weber kettle when smoking / grilling and these grills are a great fit (I normally wear XL gloves when working on the ambulance), and have saved my food. I can pick up the hot grates to move around coals or to add fuel without fear with these gloves. They also stay outside under the grill that is covered, and no signs of wear / tear (other than being a little dirty, meh). A+ seller, A+ gloves. Going to buy the mediums for my wife since she does work in the oven and I don't want her to burn herself.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F

customer_reviews.title: Best grill/oven mitt/glove I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: "I love these but the wife does not like that you have to use other hand to put on. They are extremely heat resistant for normal range cooking temperatures ( I have not tried anything over 500 deg). The grip is really good and I like that you have your fingers free to help grab with, unlike most mitten style oven gloves. I have recommended to friends." Edit: After a month I caught the wife using the Grill Glove Pro instead of the old style mitt, she is now hooked. :)
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have long needed a good pair of grilling gloves. Oven mitts just don't do the trick. Used these over the weekend for a rib cook. I was able to pick up the grate with two slabs on it without issue. Very comfortable with excellent grip. Like others have noted, these are GLOVES. They do not extend far past the wrist. Therefore, I would not advise using these over a high flame/high heat cool where your arms would be exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love my oven/bbq gloves and use them all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Love my oven/bbq gloves and use them all the time. These gloves allow me to turn and move shish kabob skewers on the grill easily. I can also take baking dishes out of a 400 degree oven without my hands feeling warm. One caution...if they get wet, the water transfers heat quickly (I kinda remember that from science class in junior high) and you will get burned. It only happened to me once, but once was enough to ensure I never let it happen again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome Kitchen Essential!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these a long time ago. These gloves have more than met my expectations for functionality and being able to handle the heat. I procrastinated in my replacement of Orka silicone glove which isn't functional at all for gripping hot items. These gloves allow for a feeling of security and are comfortable. I really like the blue color. Should have bought these years ago as my wife and I cook multiple meals a day and these are just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection from heat sources!  I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for my husband who has very large hands and he loves them. They have some "stretch" to them that makes for a perfect fit. The ribbed surface allows him a firm, stable grip. He grabbed the smoker rack while his smoker was on and he did not feel any heat. This is amazing as he has heat sensitive hands.
customer_reviews.author: DB Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves arrived on time and are of excellent quality, as described. They fit my small hands without my hands swimming in them, but will also work for my husband when he BBQs. The many rubber "spots" prevent slippage, and I have not felt heat coming through the glove. I would definitely recommend the product. The only surprise was that the color of glove I received was different than that pictured (grey with pink spots).
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Any BBQ Fan will Love These!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well! So highly recommend for any BBQ-head!
customer_reviews.author: Aidea

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kitchen or grilling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves for grilling but ended up using them in my kitchen more often than not. They are nice for grabbing something quick and even for holding something for a few seconds. The heat does start to get through to your hand after about 45+ seconds of holding something that is super hot from the oven or stove.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, functional, and stylish gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking and stylish. I always used the traditional mitten style but this time I wanted to try the normal (with fingers) style gloves and glade I did. Certainly much easier to use, very comfortable, high quality, and looks really good. I normally use my oven at 350 to 400 degrees. I used the glove to pic my pyrex baking dish and rearranged the oven's shelves with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Moody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: This is based on using the gloves exactly once (don't need them that often). These are excellent gloves. They fit well, are comfortable, and are flexible enough for normal use (not quite line no gloves at all). They definitely defend against the heat. I grill veggies on a metal sheet once a week, and with my old gloves, I need to be careful how I held the sheet so as to minimize contact (failure to do so results in light burns.) Just to ops test, I laid the sheet on my open hand. The sheet felt warm, but not uncomfortably so. These are a keeper
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Bakeing gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are great for backing . No more burned fingers
customer_reviews.author: Wiseoldowl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gloves; Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: As we do a lot of grilling and smoking here we were looking for an inexpensive, yet top notch pair of heat resistant gloves. These Makimy gloves fit the bill! They fit wonderfully and give you excellent control and grip when handling hot objects, such as grates. These are also perfect for use in the kitchen while removing scorching hot pans from the oven or stovetop. You will not feel the heat at all! They are also made well and are of great quality and durability for frequent usage. And the great price sweetens the deal. Buy these gloves! You will not regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: they are wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: gloves are a little tight so if you have large hands, they will not fit. Also wish they were longer so there was more protection for the wrist and arm area. Regarding the heat protection, they are wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot oven and microwave
customer_reviews.text: They fit, they are easy to use and protect my hands from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: GoldieLox

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have defintely enjoyed using my grill gloves since purchase. Not only are they far superior in heat isolation from the oven mitts I previously used, they allow a dexterity that really makes tasks easier. As a bonus, they also have helped me remove some tight lids on jars - those little dots really give you a great grip! I've only used them inside but am defintely looking forward to grilling season!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baars

customer_reviews.title: Good item, needs to be a darker color
customer_reviews.text: These are great, very useful, & priced well, but the truth is, if you're grilling, these will be filthy-looking in no time as the fabric behind the little heat-resistant dots is cream-color. I use them for the kitchen mostly, & they're still looking fine, and frankly I don't care much if they get a bit dingy as I have kids. If you do care how they look, these may not last u too long. But they work like a charm, at least for typical-sized hands.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Donald

customer_reviews.title: The gloves themselves are excellent -- good make
customer_reviews.text: The gloves themselves are excellent -- good make, handle campfires and hot cast-iron pans well. They were comfortable to wear and (for thick gloves) easy to move in. However, we had four people on the trip and the (medium) gloves fit none of them quite right; the fingers were too short for half and too long for the others. That's the risk of "standard sizes" of course, but it was a disappointment given how nice the gloves are otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: armarten

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are awesome! they would get 6 STARS except the inner ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome! they would get 6 STARS except the inner liner should be attached to the outer piece, at least at the fingertip to prevent them from pulling out.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for " too hot to handle"
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic thermal gloves. I've had a chance to test them while making my thanksgiving turkey and I'm happy with the protection and flexibility they provided. I felt some heat through them from the stove and rack while pulling the roast pan out but nothing uncomfortable. Definitely better than using bulky mittens or pads. Even my husband can use them since they're pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: As far as protecting your hands from heat, these gloves are just ok. I would have rated it the product a 4 though if it didn't have a lining that pulled out of each glove when you take them off. It is a giant PITA trying to get the lining back in.
customer_reviews.author: RMunde

customer_reviews.title: These gloves make me smile
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have great grip and are reasonably good insulators (I found out the hard way that you won't want to hold a just-off-the-grill item with them for too long, but they are plenty good for general barbecue use). I like the fact that the gloves are both completely reversible front to back, so either glove works on either hand, and I love the smiley faces on the tips of each finger.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to cooks and grillers
customer_reviews.text: Everything claimed by other reviewers. I cook with cast iron and do a lot of grilling. However with cast iron, there is little margin for error because when the skillet is smokin' getting burned can be something. However, these gloves are great when re-seasoning my cast iron. Highly recommend to all cooks and grillers.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Gloves burned through after two weeks and 3 BBQs! Used on a weber grill ! Diana the president of the company got back to me immediately after this negative review. She was very concerned and cordial as was her professionalism with this situation. I know because I am a small business owner too. She sent new gloves immediately and followed up on my experience. I have since used the new gloves 4 times and they are as promised! Thanks, Diana P.S. Hoping to give 5th star after Summer of use.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for BBQing
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves for BBQing!! Very comfortable, easy to pick up things and very heat resistant. I picked up my ceramic head defuser plate when it was about 300 degree with no problem. Hardly felt any heat with these gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: SAnderson

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Used these gloves for the first time on July 4th. The fit is perfect (med) they feel snug but still allow full range of motion. I was able to reach in to my smoker and move things around and add items here and there without any problems. Much better than those big clumsy rubbery things.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing at first.
customer_reviews.text: The original order was a disappointment, it had poor quality issues. The silicone grips on one of the fingers was poorly adhered. I contacted Makimy and was given instructions (contact Amazon customer service). The replacement arrived in perfect condition. The gloves themselves do the job well. I moved hot grates from the grill with minimal heat transfer. So far so good, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cel Burn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to handle hot kabob holders. These were all metal and long so I wanted gloves to hold the units when turning them. I have an infrared barbeque which is very hot so I needed protection while maneuvering the kabobs so they would cook evenly. I tried standard oven gloves but they did not give me the protection from the heat to my satisfaction. These barbecue gloves worked great.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Gloves I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great, I bought them when I bought some new grill equipment, there great for working around really hot stuff, I mean you pretty near can pick up hot coals, all though I don't recommend it. No kidding there worth the money, never burn your hands and fingers again be cool ,keep cool buy em, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sliwinski

customer_reviews.title: Great When Using Big Green Egg
customer_reviews.text: We bought these specifically to use when smoking on our Big Green Egg. They fit perfectly and are very comfortable. They are loose on me compared to my husband but we are both able to use them. I never fell any heat when using them. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren F

customer_reviews.title: Little Snugger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a little snugger than expected (even as an XL) and the dexterity was a little less than I had hoped for. Nice gloves never the less. With the fingers were a touch longer (maybe 1/8-1/4" longer).
customer_reviews.author: WRP

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a set of heat resistant gloves that you can use at an instance, then this is your set! They are just what the doctor ordered!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yancey

customer_reviews.title: bought them mostly for my husband but I LOVE them too and would like to see them made ...
customer_reviews.text: These glove are the answer to the problem!!! We have other silicone hot pads but they are too flimsy....scared will drop burning hot pan...bought them mostly for my husband but I LOVE them too and would like to see them made small, med, and lg. even on my husband they are large but....still work great! He really likes them!! A must for grillers Especially if you use pans on the grill which I always do!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect oven glove!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic heat resistant gloves. I especially love them because of their allowable dexterity with the individual finger extensions as opposed to my previous oven mitts which seem so awkward to use when handling extremely hot metallic pans or oven trays. They are easy to don on & off, comfortable fit and look great in the process. These Makimy gloves appear to be made of good quality material and durability and I'm sure they will prove to be an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DrPookey

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen gloves
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite kitchen gloves. I haven't burned my hands once since I got these. They really withstand heat well. The one thing I wish they had were small tabs to hang them near my oven...but functionally they work great and were well worth the hefty price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best grill/oven gloves ever. There is very little heat transfer. Ability to grasp hot items using all fingers independently has dramatically improved my cooking technique. Far less likely to get in the way (or into the food) than other gloves. A great fit for most men with average to large hands, but not so much for everyone else, however I hear they are coming out with a smaller version branded for women. I think it would also be better if the end of the gloves extended farther down the arm, which would be especially helpful while grilling.
customer_reviews.author: JonH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gloves
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it's supposed to do. I love them. The only complaint I have is that they are large for a woman. But not too big that they aren't useful (and I have very small hands). I bought these specifically for camping but I want to get some for home, too! I just wish they offered a ladies version.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: These gloves do a good job of insulating
customer_reviews.text: These gloves do a good job of insulating. But in warm weather, when your hands are sweating, the liner often pulls out of the glove when you pull them off your hand. The loops on the gloves used for hanging them broke after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Handles the hot stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace older “ove gloves.” Heat resistance is so much better! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great - work great
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves - we use them for working with 700 degree heat sealers. They save your hands from the occasional singe from touching a heat sealer. UPDATE: Gloves are still working well for us - we do have to replace them every few months, but they get used day in and day out.
customer_reviews.author: OA AO

customer_reviews.title: good grip. The lining detached from the fingers in ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent insulation, good grip. The lining detached from the fingers in one of the gloves, rendering it useless. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craiger

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Must Have for Serios Grillers
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my gloves on time and they were packaged and shipped very nicely. The gloves are very nice and fit as descibed. They well made with high quality materials. A must have for anyone who loves grilling and playing around inside a hot grill or oven like I do. Green Egg owners will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Optimist

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling gloves
customer_reviews.text: So far I love these gloves. My hands are kept cool from the heat of the grill, and I have even managed to pick up my grill grates shortly after turning off my grill without feeling any sensation that my hands were going to burn. I would definitely recommend them. I have smaller hands, and the medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Good for oven temps under 350 deg f
customer_reviews.text: Good for oven temps under 350 deg f. Temps above that you start to feel heat through the gloves rather quickly. Best use is for stove top pot handles and covers that are prone to get hot while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: I love these cooking gloves for both indoor and outdoor use. I can take a pan directly from the broiler to the counter without any problem, and I have enough control with them to use on the barbecue. My engineer son in Texas assures me that he loves his as well - they were his Father's Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: David Block

customer_reviews.title: Good product that could be better
customer_reviews.text: They offer a lot of protection, though you can still feel the heat while holding something for a long-ish period of time. I'll keep these around until they are unusable, but would probably try something with a higher heat rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: No more blisters on my fingers!
customer_reviews.text: No blisters on my fingers! Works as advertised! I'd buy it again when it come the time to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Eventually the heat does get through the glove, but it doesn't start burning you or anything, unless you held on for too long.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If you grill, you need these!!
customer_reviews.text: I have other grill gloves but these are my favorite. They are comfortable and protect very well, no problem at all picking up hot coals. If you use a grill or smoker or just need protection in the kitchen, I highly recommend these gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Champion

customer_reviews.title: Just got a new Kamado style grill and needed something ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new Kamado style grill and needed something that can handle high heat. I was able to grab a pizza stone that was over 500 degrees and just started to feel the warmth coming through after a few seconds. I might have to get another pair of these!
customer_reviews.author: jondska

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gloves for an industrial use (polishing aluminum accents) and the gloves work great. Totally block the heat from the process from my fingers and allow me to get the work done better and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Cvijanovic

customer_reviews.title: Quality is never cheap, but it can be a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I received a Makimy barbecue set for Christmas and was so impressed I turned around and ordered the grill brush, gloves and pork puller claws. These are great tools and a real bargain if you are serious about grilling and smoking. I hate to make assumptions, but I'd be willing to bet the folks that designed this stuff spent some time elbow deep in a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: skeeterfitz

customer_reviews.title: Good for kitchen or grill
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are a bit loose on my small hands, but they do not feel like they will fall off, and I am able to grip things easily. I have used them to grab a cookie sheet, and for heat protection when I am turning meat on the grill. I don't feel any heat through the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: CAD519

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a product that so exceeded my expectations. These gloves are COMFORTABLE, easy to use, and so heat resistant it's not funny. I found myself still wearing them without being aware of them long after I needed the heat protection.
